divs: sighting detailswell first me and my friend were sleeping in the living room were were very young fall asleep woke up about 4 to 5 maybe and i seen some flickering lights went to the kitchen window looked out and seen these beings walking up the hill towards me then i dont remember after that than after that had them in my room surrounding my bed i was very young and so scared when i would see ufo on tv or grey type being i would break down and start to cry. i really didnt see there object but from the hill that i seen them walking up they were down on the ground. i know i was ubducted and i would love to go threw the test weather it hypno therpy orgettting checked for probes in my body i know i have. if u can help this is somthing that i always wanted to understand an investigate i would love to join mufon the subject gets me going i fill like hunting ufo is me just dont know were to start please please help me out i know its worth it u guys wont regret it promise u. since that insident i sware there like little kids that get into stuff the "beings" of course a couple of times i almost caught them i promise. i would love to join mufon and hunt with u i live in mariposa california my name is [name removed\cms\tg] please call me [number removed\cms\tg] leave a message if i dont answer and i will return your call or if u want to send me something [address removed\cms\tg]. thanx so much for ur time i really need to do this thanx guys. thanks, [name removed\cms\tg]
